name: Outer Isle Chain
role_in_state: offshore transshipment, pilotage and navigational outposts
economy_niches: saltworks, kelp products and salted fish export
transshipment hub for imported ritual reagents
culture_adjustments: stronger ship-kin networks over land kinship
local augury rites tied to specific currents and rocks
high seasonal population fluctuation; visitor-heavy customs
constraints: dependence on mainland imports for ritual reagents
notes: favored relay point for navigational auguries
lighthouse upkeep often a guild obligation
seasonal labor markets tied to fishing and transshipment
